discussion.content:
It should be USER AND USER, To set up a hierarchy, you would choose the manager at the Top of the hierarchy, it will bring your organization hierarchy.

2. To set viewing permissions

In the User security field section, choose User lookup field. Choosing this field determines the owner of the forecast row. The following default system user value is selected based on the template:

For Territory forecast, the value is selected as Manager

User as the hierarchy, and Created By as the field (as that is usually the Owner of the Opp record)
